item.description:
FRI DEC 2 –COMPANY -Winner of 6 Tony Awards with Connecticut Theatre Group *ADV TIX DISCOUNT*

The clashing sounds and pulsing rhythms of New York City underscore this landmark musical, considered by many to have inaugurated the modern era of musical theatre.

"Company" follows our anti-hero bachelor Robert as he makes his way through a series of encounters with April (the stewardess), Kathy (the girl who's going to marry someone else), Marta (the "peculiar" one), as well as with his married friends.

On the night of his 35th birthday, confirmed bachelor Robert contemplates his unmarried state. In vignette after hilarious vignette, we are introduced to "those good and crazy people," his married friends, as Robert weighs the pros and cons of married life. In the end, he realizes being alone is "alone, not alive."

From the award winning composer of Into the Woods, Sweeny Todd,
and A Little Night Music.

“There’s never been a franker, more sophisticated work written for musical stage”- San Francisco Examiner Directed by Leslie Unger, Music Direction by Colin Britt

An honest, witty, sophisticated look at relationships, Company is as contemporary and relevant as ever (witness the recent hit revivals on Broadway and the West End). It features a brilliant energetic score containing many of Stephen Sondheim's best-known songs, including "Another Hundred People," "The Ladies Who Lunch," and "Being Alive".

Pre-Party starts at 6:30pm - Show starts at 8pm FREE SAFE PARKING

**RECEIVE A 20% DISCOUNT ON FOOD AND DRINK AT THE PRE-PARTY WITH YOUR TICKET**

Advance Tickets are $25 * Tickets are $30 at the event


Playhouse on Park
244 Park Road
West Hartford, CT 06119

EXIT 43 PARK ROAD off 84 * Next to AC Petersons

Pick up your ticket before the show at the pre-Party with the Connecticut Theatre Group, or at the will call window

WE HAVE A VERY LIMITED NUMBER OF TICKETS IN
THE CONNECTICUT THEATRE GROUP SECTION

THIS EVENT WILL SELL OUT - GET YOUR TICKET NOW

 

 

 

 

 

 

Visit http://www.CTTheatre.org or call (860) 987-7888
